snippet: A French citizen arrested for violating an army curfew was beaten to death in an Egyptian jail cell late Monday night, on the same day that two Canadians held without charge for more than a month began a hunger strike.
abstract: A French citizen arrested for violating an army curfew was beaten to death in an Egyptian jail cell late Monday night, on the same day that two Canadians held without charge for more than a month began a hunger strike.

headline.main: French Teacher Killed in Cairo Jail as Detained Canadians Begin Hunger Strike

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
